attributes.action: A green tax of £5.00 should be levied on entry to large theme parks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A green tax of £5.00 should be levied on entry to large theme parks. The large theme parks are known for damaging the environment. This will encourage people to use local funfairs and reduce traffic. This will raise revenue for the Exchequer and be good for the environment.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
